description: Web Hooks are subscriptions to allowed events that, when the event occurs, the event data is sent to the uri set in the Web Hook document.

name.description: A friendly name for the webhook

uri.description: The 3rd party URI to call out to on event

http_verb.description: What HTTP method to use when contacting the server

hook.description: The trigger event for a request being made to 'callback_uri'.

retries.description: Retry the request this many times (if it fails)
